comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/7185069991/ Both these pics appear to have the name 'Perrottet' written on the negative...I wonder if they were connected...possibly the same person...it's a bit hard to tell unless you have two pics taken from the same angle...the ears don't seem to match...work in progress!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Interesting, I hadn't noticed that before. Trove turns up mentions of a ballet dancer (Phillipe) and an artist - (George) with the surnames Perrottet... Not sure about priests!
